title: AliExpress Product Scraper
description: Extract product listings from AliExpress search results. Get product details including prices, ratings, seller info, and images.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Direct AliExpress search URL. If provided, overrides keyword search.

minPrice.title: Minimum Price
minPrice.description: Filter products with price greater than or equal to this value.

maxPrice.title: Maximum Price
maxPrice.description: Filter products with price less than or equal to this value.

results_wanted.title: Results Wanted
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of products to collect.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings. Residential proxies recommended for AliExpress.
